title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

One point for each of the following explanations/ identifications

Difference between introns and exons

Description of splicing

5′ cap added or description of function

3′ poly A tail added or description of function
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

3 points maximum

One point for each of the following explanations/ identifications

Student response earns two of the available points.
